column4: im on kubuntu trying to install gnome with Adept it is on 0% preparing and seems to be stuck, waht should i do?
I'd try from the terminal with aptitude install ubuntu-desktop to see what's goin on
sudo aptitude ...
is that what i type in
okay tanks
sudo aptitude install ubuntu-desktop
okay thank you
after that what else do i have to do to be using ubuntu instead of kubuntu
well at next boot you can choose gnome at the login screen. to switch to gdm do sudo dpkg-reconfigure gdm
what does gdm stand for? and thats ubuntu instead of kubuntu and id just have to uninstall kubuntu?
gdm is the gnome login manager
you can keep using the kde one, kdm, though
if you don't want to keep kde you can uninstall it yes
, Flannel , and sladen thank you
to remove kde sudo apt-get --purge remove kdelibs kdelibs-bin
but you can keep both if you like
okay thanks, and then it will be just as if i installed ubuntu from the disc?
in case you decide to stay with kde after trying gnome
ya thanks
yes
okay kool thank you
